DOC.brief_summary: The investigator propose conduct randomize control trial evaluate whether administration phenazopyridine prior procedure decrease office cystoscopy time . Women undergo in-office cystoscopy Boston Urogynecology recruit .
DOC.detailed_description: All potentially eligible participant complete history , physical examination , urinalysis urine culture clinical purpose . After eligibility confirm write , informed consent obtain , participant randomize one two study arm . Participants randomize phenazopyridine arm receive 200 mg mouth approximately 60 minute prior schedule cystoscopy . During cystoscopy , various time point , time recorded.The color efflux also document .
DOC.criteria: Female patient undergoing inoffice diagnostic cystoscopy Boston Urogynecology Associates Women take vitamin B day cystoscopy Cystoscopy concurrent treatment botulinum toxin periurethral bulking injection Allergy phenazopyridine
